nodes.text: Deliver Us From Jedi Evil was a Separatist anti-Jedi propaganda poster created by Moshenu Phobi during the Clone Wars. The image depicts a bearded Jedi with full hood up and ominous glowing eyes with several fists raised in protest against a blue background, plus what was then the Jedi Temple on Coruscant being in the foreground. The artist, Moshenu Phobi, was drawing upon the Jedi Order's reputation as warmongers.
